text.tspan: Code follows down from here and returns a
Combination of template, data handling perl
Passed to a perl routines here
Combination of perl and FM/CGI code
Passed to a perl routines here
Overarching SME commands inc CLI commands
Main interfaces to the configuration DBs
FormMagick formatting code is liberally sprayed round in the files in web/functions and the files in FormMagick/Panel
There is no separation between format and function.
There is no simple way to change the interface system as there is so much hardcoding
FormMagick is old and not easy to use
The files in FormMagick/Panel contain lots of useful routines to do all the jobs we currently requirezz
